checkUpkeep(bytes).details: This is function that the Chainlink Automation nodes call to see if it's time to perform the upkeep. The following should be true for this to return true: 1. The time interval has passed between raffle runs 2. THe raffle is in the OPEN state 3. The contract has ETH(aka, players) 4. (Implicit) The subscription is funded with LINK

documentation.text:
@dev This is function that the Chainlink Automation nodes call to see if it's time to perform the upkeep.
 The following should be true for this to return true:
 1. The time interval has passed between raffle runs
 2. THe raffle is in the OPEN state
 3. The contract has ETH(aka, players)
 4. (Implicit) The subscription is funded with LINK
